import React from "react"; const About = () => { return (
{/* Header Section */}

About NutriFit-Hub üçè

Your ultimate partner for a healthier lifestyle!

{/* Mission */}

Our Mission

At NutriFit-Hub, our mission is to empower individuals to achieve their health and fitness goals with expert guidance, balanced nutrition, and smart technology.

{/* Vision */}

Our Vision

To become the leading digital health and fitness platform, inspiring millions to adopt a healthier lifestyle with community support and cutting-edge technology.

{/* Future Plans */}

Our Future Plans

  • üì± Launching our Mobile App
  • üßë‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Virtual Consultations with Experts
  • ü§ñ AI-based Health Risk Prediction
  • üèãÔ∏è Collaborations with Clinics & Gyms
  • üèÉ Organizing Health Camps & Events
{/* Branch Locations */}

Our Branch Locations

We are available in these cities:

  • üè¢ Chennai - Main Branch
  • üè¢ Bangalore - Fitness & Wellness Center
  • üè¢ Hyderabad - Nutrition Counseling Hub
  • üè¢ Coimbatore - Community Health Center
  • üè¢ Coming Soon: Mumbai & Delhi
{/* What We Offer */}

What We Offer

  • ‚úÖ Customized Diet Plans & Nutrition Guidance
  • ‚úÖ AI-Powered Symptom Checker

{/* Join Us */}
Join NutriFit-Hub Today!

Take the first step toward a healthier, happier life. Let's make wellness a lifestyle together!
